thread.title: Hollyoaks kidnap, split and romance 10 big spoilers and episode guide | Metro News
thread.title_full: Hollyoaks kidnap, split and romance 10 big spoilers and episode guide | Metro News

author: Duncan Lindsay For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Hollyoaks kidnap, split and romance 10 big spoilers and episode guide | Metro News
text:
Duncan Lindsay for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 15 Feb 2017 3:03 pm (Picture: Lime Pictures) 
hearts are all over the place in Hollyoaks and some fans are going to be incredibly divided as a reunion edges closer for Ste Hay and John Paul McQueen – to the point where Ste decides it’s time to split up with Harry Thompson. Meanwhile, Sally St Claire is looking for romance – can Neeta be the one to help her? 
Elsewhere, Sienna Blake is in danger as Shane continues to blackmail Joel. As Sienna tries to get to the truth, she ends up kidnapped – but will Warren Fox race to her rescue? 
We have pulled together all of the spoilers from the drama ahead in Hollyoaks village as well as a full episode guide. 10 Hollyoaks spoilers Ste tells John Paul that he thinks he and Harry are over and then recreates the day that he proposed to prove he is romantic. Zack comes to Leela’s rescue when she is bombarded by press at Cameron’s sentencing – then asks her out on a date. Neeta accompanies Sally to an LGBT speed dating event – but will she find romance? Sienna witnesses Joel handing Shane some cash and soon confronts him over what is going on. Ste prepares to end his relationship with Harry for John Paul. Tegan and Courtney are confused when Leela loses her temper with them. Warren warns Joel to stay away from Shane after realising what he is capable of. Scott calls an intervention to resolve the tension which remains between Tony and Diane. Joel is horrified to witness Sienna being kidnapped – will Warren race to her rescue and is everything as it seems? Mac is frantic that Marnie will discover his secrets. Monday 20th February 
Joel sets up a fundraiser and recruits Cleo’s help but is shaken when he is faced with Shane again. Meanwhile, Leela gets rid of Cameron’s old biking gear and Zack watches her longingly. Later, he comes to her rescue when journalists hound her at Cameron’s sentencing and then asks her on a date. (Picture: Lime Pictures) 
Ste tells a stunned John Paul that he thinks that he and Harry are over. Determined to prove his romantic side, Ste recreates the day that he proposed but is it enough to win John Paul back? Tuesday 21st February 
John Paul and Ste reconnect and Ste prepares to break things off with Harry. 
Tegan and Courtney are confused by an angry outburst from Leela and believe that it’s about Daniel’s dad. Tegan gives Zak hope about Leela and Shane continues to blackmail Joel over Katy. Wednesday 22nd February 
Mac is worried that Marnie will discover his secrets following Nathan’s death. Scott tries to restore peace between Diane and Tony. 
Sienna is suspicious after Joel hands a bag of cash to Shane and she sets out to confront him. Realising what Shane is capable of, Warren warns Joel to stay away. Thursday 23rd February 
Joel is stunned when he witnesses Sienna being abducted and Warren springs into action after receiving pictures of her tied up. Shane plans a surprise holiday for him, Goldie and the sons but will he let them down? 
Sally is embarrassed when Neeta catches her looking at a lonely hearts column. Clocking an LGBT speed dating event at Nightingale’s, Neeta invites Sally along. Friday 24th February 
Will Sally find romance as she and Neeta attend the speed dating event? 
Meanwhile, Warren is on the hunt for Shane. Metro Blogs is a place for opinions. These opinions belong to the author and are not necessarily shared by Metro. More
